intent: Identify and fix a bug causing test failures, iterating until tests pass

success_criteria.primary: All tests pass after the fix
success_criteria.secondary: Fix is minimal and correct — doesn't break other functionality

must_avoid: Deleting or commenting out failing tests
Overly broad changes that touch unrelated code
Introducing new bugs while fixing the original

quality_rubric.correctness: The fix addresses the root cause, not just the symptom
quality_rubric.minimality: Change is surgical — only what's needed to fix the bug
quality_rubric.safety: Doesn't introduce regressions or undefined behavior

convergence.success_indicator: Tests pass or agent reports CONVERGED
